description: In coordination with the Prime Minister's Office/Office for Good Governance and Human Rights and the Agency for Gender Equality, UNDP is planning to undertake a research/survey regarding persons with disabilities to identify the urgent needs.

subproject.description: Preparation of a report on situation of people with disabilities in Kosovo with main priorities to be addressed and collected data to serve as a base line for prioritizing actions defined by the Office of the Prime Minister/Office of Good governance Disability Action Plan (DAP). Furthermore, acquired data will provide substantial information to civil society representatives advocating for specific groups of citizens living with various disabilities, with a special focus on women with disabilities, who may double marginalized, and minority women, who may be triply marginalized.
subproject.title: Disability Project Survey

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

title: Population Survey for the persons with disabilities
